`openrcsb` is a command line interface (CLI) program to quickly launch the RCSB page for a PDB entry.


## Usage

Usage: `openrcsb [-h] pdbid`

Open RCSB PDB page in webbrowser

Positional arguments:

Tag             |Descrption        
:-----------    |:-----------------
`pdbid`         |  the ID of the structure in the RCSB PDB to load

Options:

Tag             |Descrption        
:-----------    |:-----------------
`-h`, `--help`  | Shows this help message and exit
